function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Difficulty conveying comprehensive information that reflects uncertainty to the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public’s lack of understanding of professional knowledge about risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public seeking unproven information or rumors due to uncertainty","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concealment of information by governments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consensus in expert judgments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interdisciplinary challenges in risk assessment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate information disclosure from the government to the public","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in deciding what information to disclose to the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of government decision-making on risk governance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of equivocal expressions in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specialized communication strategies for separate groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to consider audience perceptions and concerns in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate risk communication during an ongoing investigation of an unknown disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Silencing and punishing of ’rumormongers’ during the initial outbreak of an unknown disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective risk preparedness leading to shortage of goods, loose management, and disordered collaboration among agencies","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctant information disclosure leading to public’s ignorance of self-protection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Politics being the most important issue restricting the voice of the academic community","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to establish networks of working relationships among individuals, groups, and agencies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading information and panic buying of unproven medicines and protective equipment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding and perception of the outbreak leading to extreme behaviors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exaggerated scientific claims leading to misinformation and lack of perception of risk.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Miscommunication of covid-19 transmission characteristics leading to public perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguous information about outbreak handling by the government","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and conspiracy theories online","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in risk communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government concealing information about the outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in government communication","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of conspiracy theories and rumors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of timely warning to the public about the outbreak","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Government decision making based on political interests and social stability rather than public health","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in government control measures due to balancing political, stability, and economic factors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of scientific risk communication in decision making","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate risk interpretation in communication","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited government information incubation","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"}]}
